notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization: G.B.-B., B.O.-F., R.I.G.-V. and I.L.-M.; methodology: A.R.-L. and M.Á.F.-V.; formal analysis: G.B.-B.; investigation: G.B.-B., B.O.-F. and R.I.G.-V.; resources: I.L.-M.; writing—original draft preparation: G.B.-B.; writing—review and editing: G.B.-B., B.O.-F., R.I.G.-V. and I.L.-M. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
